titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Maiestie at Whitehall, March 22. 1617. being Passion-Sunday, touching prostration, and kneeling in the worship of God. To which is added a discourse concerning kneeling at the Communion. By Iohn, Bishop of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Buckeridge, John, 1562?-1631.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Maiestie at Whitehall, March 22. 1617. being Passion-Sunday, touching prostration, and kneeling in the worship of God. To which is added a discourse concerning kneeling at the Communion. By Iohn, Bishop of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Buckeridge, John, 1562?-1631.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" in a headpiece.
With a final errata and colophon leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: A discourse concerning kneeling at the Communion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
